title: The Basin
provenance_text:
Charles W. Locke [1899-1983]; C. W. Kraushaar Art Galleries, New York, NY, c. 1940 until November 1943; Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), November 1943 until April 1, 1973 [1]; bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.
 
Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited in the 1943 "Painting in the United States" exhibition at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October-December 1943 (no. 177.) Mr. Rosenbloom purchased the painting from the exhibition for $500 (his check dated November 17, 1943.)  See also "American Paintings and Sculpture to 1945 in the Carnegie Museum of Art," pages 326-327.

creator.death_place: Garrison (Putnam county, New York state, United States)
